mapper.select: SELECT co.COSTKEY costkey, p.NAME prjname, TO_CHAR(p.STARTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')STARTDATE ,TO_CHAR(p.LASTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LASTDATE , cl.NAME company , p.MANAGER pm, co.COSTASSIGN costassign , p.PROJECTKEY prjkey FROM PROJECT p , CLIENT cl , COST co WHERE co.PROJECTKEY = p.PROJECTKEY AND p.CLIENTKEY = cl.CLIENTKEY
SELECT PROJECTKEY prjkey,NAME prjname FROM PROJECT ORDER BY prjkey ASC
SELECT COSTSORTKEY cskey, CONTENT cscontent FROM COSTSORT

SELECT p.NAME, p.MANAGER , cl.NAME company , TO_CHAR(STARTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startdateS, TO_CHAR(LASTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LASTDATES,p.TAKE TAKE , c.COSTASSIGN costassign FROM PROJECT p ,CLIENT cl, COST c WHERE p.CLIENTKEY = cl.CLIENTKEY AND p.PROJECTKEY = c.PROJECTKEY AND p.PROJECTKEY = #{prjkey}

SELECT cs.CONTENT csname , cd.COSTCONTENT content , cd.COSTNOTE costnote , cd.COSTEX costex FROM COSTDETAIL cd, PROJECT p , COSTSORT cs WHERE cd.NO = p.PROJECTKEY AND cd.COSTSORTKEY = cs.COSTSORTKEY AND p.PROJECTKEY = #{prjkey}
SELECT sum(COSTEX) as amountpay FROM COSTDETAIL GROUP BY NO HAVING NO = #{prjkey}
